answers.answer: First off - are you diabetic?  metformin is normally prescribed for type II diabetes.With Thanksgiving just "beyond the dark", maybe you should chill for a day, and have a nice holiday...........Healthy weight loss doesn't come quickly, but we will certainly help guide to your goal.Aside from the vitamin D deficiency, do you have any other health issues, such as hypothyroidism, insulin resistance and PCOS - metformin is often used for either of the last two conditions.  Hypothyroidism requires its own type of med.Please let us know and we will try to help guide you in the right direction.Welcome and Happy Thanksgiving.............
